author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Very detailed for the size
review:
Opening;

The Chinese Dragon monthly mini model build is very very detail and includes a lot of nice pieces for its size .

The build-

Starting with the head it is very nicely sloped and the oversized teeth , printed eyes and big nostrils are to its cartoonieness . Each segment of the body is declared by 1×1 corner tiles in white or yellow .

In conclusion-

this is a great parts pack and actual build is great only down all is how bland the tail looks but overall I would recommend this set
